entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
